msg.msgText:
A "SecurityProfile" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update SecurityProfile help imaserver update SecurityProfile "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update SecurityProfile "Name=SecProfile" "CertificateProfile=CertProfile2"
Configuration items for "SecurityProfile" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
